review: Every home in the United States should have an Apple TV, I mean, provided they have at least one Apple device to stream from. The selection on Apple TV is great and if you have Netflix it replaces any other clunky gaming device you may have been using. I'm going to buy more.

review: Bought with the hopes that it would eliminate the need for cable.  Its not quite up to that task.  Netflix seems to work fine, the overall interface is just what any other Apple is.  ESPN did not work well at all (lots of buffering and below standard def quality when working) and I could never get iTunes movie rentals to work properly with my iTunes account.
